title: Bonus Mini Episode - Reacting to the Parole of O. J. Simpson
description:
The Real Crime Profile team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) reassembled to give their thoughts to the recent parole of O. J. Simpson and his absurd hearing. As always, they shone the spotlight on the forgotten victims, Ron Goldman and Nicole Brown Simpson. Jim offers a challenge to Mr. Simpson that hopefully he will accept.

#HerNameWasNicole

#HisNameWasRon
